arts.ttl: McTominay meets Conte's demand and lifts Napoli level with Serie A leader Inter
arts.sum: McTominay’s late header secured a 1-0 win at last-placed Monza on Saturday to pull Napoli level with Serie A leader Inter Milan. Earlier, 13th-placed Como won at relegation-threatened Lecce 3-0 for its third straight victory — virtually assuring Cesc Fabregas’ team of a second consecutive season in the top flight for the first time since the 1980s.

arts.ttl: Napoli Player Ratings vs Monza: McTominay Activates Hero Mode
arts.sum: Scott McTominay soaked up the limelight as tonight's 'Man of the Match' as Napoli squeezed past relegation-bound Monza at Stadio Brianteo. The Scottish ace slotted home a towering header to draw the Partenopei level with Inter at the top of the Serie A table. The post Napoli Player Ratings vs Monza: McTominay Activates Hero Mode appeared first on The Cult of Calcio.
